title: Substitute
text: Since we know $$d=204$$ and $$t=3$$, we can substitute $$204$$ for $$d$$ and $$3$$ for $$t$$ into the equation, which gives us $$204=3r$$.
speech: Since we know  d is equal to 204  and  t, is equal to 3 , we can substitute  204  for  d  and  3  for  t  into the equation, which gives us  204 is equal to 3 r .

title: Isolate
text: To isolate $$r$$, we can divide both sides by $$3$$.
